Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. `` There will be huge explosions all over Fleet Street if police get to the truth,'' he told the BBC. According to the Morning News, Dwaine Caraway on Tuesday told Dallas sports radio station 1310 AM that he honored Michael Vick because he thinks the quarterback can be a role model for kids. These kids are the future, and we don't have enough folks out here joining hands and turning lives around, Dwaine Caraway said, according to the newspaper. Katie Price , who has just split from husband Alex Reid, would face competition in the form of Robbie Williams , who is also being lined up to fill Simon Cowell 's place. A source said, Robbie Williams is a huge name so would naturally be a massive ratings hit. Not only that, he is also straight-talking and comical. We all understand that right now America is where Simon Cowell 's focus has to be. There aren't many people that can fill his shoes, but Robbie Williams just might be able to do it. this capacity that Donald Rumsfeld met with Saddam Hussein in 1983- an event that Donald Rumsfeld uses to kick off the book. Donald Rumsfeld archly notes that the encounter, at which he was filmed shaking Saddam Hussein 's hand, would become the subject of gossip, rumors, and crackpot conspiracy theories for more than a quarter of a century. In Donald Rumsfeld 's telling, the whole business was a fairly straightforward case of great-power politics.
